description: This is one of those dinners that has evolved over the years
name: Tomato Chicken Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the chicken for about 5 minutes/side  don't cook it all the way through as it will cook again later. Season well
Once chicken is nearly cooked  remove it from pan and cut into pieces. Set aside
Cook onions, carrots and zucchini until soft, add tins of tomato, Mrs Balls Chutney, tomato sauce/paste, garlic and Italian seasoning. Simmer for about 5 minutes

Add pasta (yes straight out of the bag), fresh tomatoes and 100ml of chicken stockPut lid on and cook until pasta is al dente (you will need to check on it regularly to ensure that it is not sticking). If you do need more liquid  use more stock
Once the pasta is nearly cooked  add the chicken back to the pan
Add spinach and parmesan and mix in well
Turn off heat and mix in the sour cream  once this is well mixed in - the heat can be put back on to a low heat. Serve hot
